mnd4:3.2: **Passāmi suddhan**ti passāmi suddhaṃ, dakkhāmi suddhaṃ, olokemi suddhaṃ, nijjhāyāmi suddhaṃ, upaparikkhāmi suddhaṃ.
mnd4:3.3: **Paramaṃ arogan**ti paramaṃ ārogyappattaṃ tāṇappattaṃ leṇappattaṃ saraṇappattaṃ abhayappattaṃ accutappattaṃ amatappattaṃ nibbānappattanti—
mnd4:4.2: Cakkhuviññāṇaṃ rūpadassanena narassa suddhi visuddhi parisuddhi, mutti vimutti parimutti hoti, naro sujjhati visujjhati parisujjhati, muccati vimuccati parimuccatīti—
mnd4:5.2: Evaṃ abhijānanto ājānanto vijānanto paṭivijānanto paṭivijjhanto.
mnd4:5.3: “Idaṃ paramaṃ aggaṃ seṭṭhaṃ visiṭṭhaṃ pāmokkhaṃ uttamaṃ pavaran”ti ñatvā jānitvā tulayitvā tīrayitvā vibhāvayitvā vibhūtaṃ katvāti—
mnd4:6.2: Yo suddhaṃ passati, so suddhānupassī, **pacceti** **ñāṇan**ti cakkhuviññāṇaṃ rūpadassanena ñāṇanti pacceti, maggoti pacceti, pathoti pacceti, niyyānanti paccetīti—
mnd4:10.2: Cakkhuviññāṇaṃ rūpadassanena ce narassa suddhi visuddhi parisuddhi, mutti vimutti parimutti hoti, naro sujjhati visujjhati parisujjhati, muccati vimuccati parimuccatīti—
mnd4:11.1: **Ñāṇena vā so pajahāti dukkhan**ti cakkhuviññāṇaṃ rūpadassanena ce naro jātidukkhaṃ pajahati, jarādukkhaṃ pajahati, byādhidukkhaṃ pajahati, maraṇadukkhaṃ pajahati, sokaparidevadukkhadomanassupāyāsadukkhaṃ pajahatīti—
mnd4:12.2: Aññena asuddhimaggena micchāpaṭipadāya aniyyānikapathena aññatra satipaṭṭhānehi aññatra sammappadhānehi aññatra iddhipādehi aññatra indriyehi aññatra balehi aññatra bojjhaṅgehi aññatra ariyā aṭṭhaṅgikā maggā naro sujjhati visujjhati parisujjhati, muccati vimuccati parimuccati.
mnd4:12.3: **Sopadhīko**ti sarāgo sadoso samoho samāno sataṇho sadiṭṭhi sakileso saupādānoti—
mnd4:13.4: **Tathā vadānan**ti tathā vadantaṃ kathentaṃ bhaṇantaṃ dīpayantaṃ voharantaṃ.
mnd4:13.5: “Sassato loko, idameva saccaṃ moghamaññan”ti tathā vadantaṃ kathentaṃ bhaṇantaṃ dīpayantaṃ voharantaṃ.
mnd4:13.13: hoti ca na ca hoti tathāgato paraṃ maraṇā …
mnd4:13.14: neva hoti na na hoti tathāgato paraṃ maraṇā, idameva saccaṃ moghamaññan”ti tathā vadantaṃ kathentaṃ bhaṇantaṃ dīpayantaṃ voharantanti—
mnd4:13.15: diṭṭhī hi naṃ pāva tathā vadānaṃ.
mnd4:15.4: Diṭṭhī hi naṃ pāva tathā vadānan”ti.
mnd4:17.1: **Na brāhmaṇo aññato suddhimāha diṭṭhe sute sīlavate mute vā**ti.
mnd4:17.4: sakkāyadiṭṭhi bāhitā hoti, vicikicchā bāhitā hoti, sīlabbataparāmāso bāhito hoti, rāgo bāhito hoti, doso bāhito hoti, moho bāhito hoti, māno bāhito hoti.
mnd4:17.5: Bāhitāssa honti pāpakā akusalā dhammā saṃkilesikā ponobhavikā sadarā dukkhavipākā āyatiṃ jātijarāmaraṇiyā.
mnd4:19.2: Brāhmaṇo aññena asuddhimaggena micchāpaṭipadāya aniyyānikapathena aññatra satipaṭṭhānehi aññatra sammappadhānehi aññatra iddhipādehi aññatra indriyehi aññatra balehi aññatra bojjhaṅgehi aññatra ariyena aṭṭhaṅgikena maggena suddhiṃ visuddhiṃ parisuddhiṃ, muttiṃ vimuttiṃ parimuttiṃ, nāha na katheti na bhaṇati na dīpayati na voharatīti—
mnd4:20.3: Te ekaccānaṃ rūpānaṃ dassanaṃ maṅgalaṃ paccenti, ekaccānaṃ rūpānaṃ dassanaṃ amaṅgalaṃ paccenti.
mnd4:20.5: Te kālato vuṭṭhahitvā abhimaṅgalagatāni rūpāni passanti—
mnd4:20.6: cāṭakasakuṇaṃ passanti, phussaveḷuvalaṭṭhiṃ passanti, gabbhinitthiṃ passanti, kumārakaṃ khandhe āropetvā gacchantaṃ passanti, puṇṇaghaṭaṃ passanti, rohitamacchaṃ passanti, ājaññaṃ passanti, ājaññarathaṃ passanti, usabhaṃ passanti, gokapilaṃ passanti.
mnd4:20.9: Palālapuñjaṃ passanti, takkaghaṭaṃ passanti, rittaghaṭaṃ passanti, naṭaṃ passanti, naggasamaṇakaṃ passanti, kharaṃ passanti, kharayānaṃ passanti, ekayuttayānaṃ passanti, kāṇaṃ passanti, kuṇiṃ passanti, khañjaṃ passanti, pakkhahataṃ passanti, jiṇṇakaṃ passanti, byādhikaṃ passanti, mataṃ passanti.
mnd4:20.12: Te diṭṭhena suddhiṃ visuddhiṃ parisuddhiṃ muttiṃ vimuttiṃ parimuttiṃ paccenti.
mnd4:21.2: Te ekaccānaṃ saddānaṃ savanaṃ maṅgalaṃ paccenti, ekaccānaṃ saddānaṃ savanaṃ amaṅgalaṃ paccenti.
mnd4:21.4: Te kālato vuṭṭhahitvā abhimaṅgalagatāni saddāni suṇanti—
mnd4:21.5: vaḍḍhāti vā vaḍḍhamānāti vā puṇṇāti vā phussāti vā asokāti vā sumanāti vā sunakkhattāti vā sumaṅgalāti vā sirīti vā sirīvaḍḍhāti vā.
mnd4:21.8: Kāṇoti vā kuṇīti vā khañjoti vā pakkhahatoti vā jiṇṇakoti vā byādhikoti vā matoti vā chindanti vā bhindanti vā daḍḍhanti vā naṭṭhanti vā natthīti vā.
mnd4:21.11: Te sutena suddhiṃ visuddhiṃ parisuddhiṃ muttiṃ vimuttiṃ parimuttiṃ paccenti.
mnd4:22.2: Te sīlamattena saṃyamamattena saṃvaramattena avītikkamamattena suddhiṃ visuddhiṃ parisuddhiṃ muttiṃ vimuttiṃ parimuttiṃ paccenti.
mnd4:22.4: “catūhi kho ahaṃ, gahapati, dhammehi samannāgataṃ purisapuggalaṃ paññāpemi sampannakusalaṃ paramakusalaṃ uttamapattippattaṃ samaṇaṃ ayojjaṃ.
mnd4:22.6: Idha, gahapati, na kāyena pāpakaṃ kammaṃ karoti, na pāpikaṃ vācaṃ bhāsati, na pāpakaṃ saṅkappaṃ saṅkappati, na pāpakaṃ ājīvaṃ ājīvati.
mnd4:22.7: Imehi kho ahaṃ, gahapati, catūhi dhammehi samannāgataṃ purisapuggalaṃ paññāpemi sampannakusalaṃ paramakusalaṃ uttamapattippattaṃ samaṇaṃ ayojjaṃ”.
mnd4:22.8: Evamevaṃ santeke samaṇabrāhmaṇā sīlasuddhikā, te sīlamattena saṃyamamattena saṃvaramattena avītikkamamattena suddhiṃ visuddhiṃ parisuddhiṃ muttiṃ vimuttiṃ parimuttiṃ paccenti.
mnd4:23.2: Te hatthivatikā vā honti, assavatikā vā honti, govatikā vā honti, kukkuravatikā vā honti, kākavatikā vā honti, vāsudevavatikā vā honti, baladevavatikā vā honti, puṇṇabhaddavatikā vā honti, maṇibhaddavatikā vā honti, aggivatikā vā honti, nāgavatikā vā honti, supaṇṇavatikā vā honti, yakkhavatikā vā honti, asuravatikā vā honti, gandhabbavatikā vā honti, mahārājavatikā vā honti, candavatikā vā honti, sūriyavatikā vā honti, indavatikā vā honti, brahmavatikā vā honti, devavatikā vā honti, disāvatikā vā honti.
mnd4:23.4: Te vatena suddhiṃ visuddhiṃ parisuddhiṃ muttiṃ vimuttiṃ parimuttiṃ paccenti.
mnd4:24.2: Te kālato uṭṭhahitvā pathaviṃ āmasanti, haritaṃ āmasanti, gomayaṃ āmasanti, kacchapaṃ āmasanti, phālaṃ akkamanti, tilavāhaṃ āmasanti, phussatilaṃ khādanti, phussatelaṃ makkhenti, phussadantakaṭṭhaṃ khādanti, phussamattikāya nhāyanti, phussasāṭakaṃ nivāsenti, phussaveṭhanaṃ veṭhenti.
mnd4:24.4: Te mutena suddhiṃ visuddhiṃ parisuddhiṃ muttiṃ vimuttiṃ parimuttiṃ paccenti.
mnd4:25.2: Brāhmaṇo diṭṭhasuddhiyāpi suddhiṃ nāha, sutasuddhiyāpi suddhiṃ nāha, sīlasuddhiyāpi suddhiṃ nāha, vatasuddhiyāpi suddhiṃ nāha, mutasuddhiyāpi suddhiṃ nāha na katheti na bhaṇati na dīpayati na voharatīti—
mnd4:25.3: na brāhmaṇo aññato suddhimāha diṭṭhe sute sīlavate mute vā.
mnd4:26.2: **Puññaṃ** vuccati yaṃ kiñci tedhātukaṃ kusalābhisaṅkhāraṃ, **apuññaṃ** vuccati sabbaṃ akusalaṃ.
mnd4:26.3: Yato puññābhisaṅkhāro ca apuññābhisaṅkhāro ca āneñjābhisaṅkhāro ca pahīnā honti ucchinnamūlā tālāvatthukatā anabhāvaṃkatā āyatiṃ anuppādadhammā;
mnd4:26.4: ettāvatā puññe ca pāpe ca na limpati na palimpati na upalimpati alitto apalitto anūpalitto nikkhanto nissaṭo vippamutto visaññutto vimariyādikatena cetasā viharatīti—
mnd4:27.4: **Attañjaho**ti taṇhāvasena diṭṭhivasena gahitaṃ parāmaṭṭhaṃ abhiniviṭṭhaṃ ajjhositaṃ adhimuttaṃ, sabbaṃ taṃ cattaṃ hoti vantaṃ muttaṃ pahīnaṃ paṭinissaṭṭhaṃ.
mnd4:27.5: **Nayidha pakubbamāno**ti puññābhisaṅkhāraṃ vā apuññābhisaṅkhāraṃ vā āneñjābhisaṅkhāraṃ vā apakubbamāno ajanayamāno asañjanayamāno anibbattayamāno anabhinibbattayamānoti—
mnd4:31.2: Purimaṃ satthāraṃ pahāya paraṃ satthāraṃ nissitā;
mnd4:31.3: purimaṃ dhammakkhānaṃ pahāya aparaṃ dhammakkhānaṃ nissitā;
mnd4:31.4: purimaṃ gaṇaṃ pahāya aparaṃ gaṇaṃ nissitā;
mnd4:31.5: purimaṃ diṭṭhiṃ pahāya aparaṃ diṭṭhiṃ nissitā;
mnd4:31.6: purimaṃ paṭipadaṃ pahāya aparaṃ paṭipadaṃ nissitā;
mnd4:31.7: purimaṃ maggaṃ pahāya aparaṃ maggaṃ nissitā sannissitā allīnā upagatā ajjhositā adhimuttāti—
mnd4:32.3: Yo rāgo sārāgo …pe… abhijjhā lobho akusalamūlaṃ.
mnd4:32.4: **Ejānugā**ti ejānugā ejānugatā ejānusaṭā ejāya pannā patitā abhibhūtā pariyādinnacittā.
mnd4:32.5: **Te na taranti saṅgan**ti rāgasaṅgaṃ dosasaṅgaṃ mohasaṅgaṃ mānasaṅgaṃ diṭṭhisaṅgaṃ kilesasaṅgaṃ duccaritasaṅgaṃ na taranti na uttaranti na pataranti na samatikkamanti na vītivattantīti—
mnd4:33.1: **Te uggahāyanti nirassajantī**ti satthāraṃ gaṇhanti, taṃ muñcitvā aññaṃ satthāraṃ gaṇhanti;
mnd4:33.2: dhammakkhānaṃ gaṇhanti, taṃ muñcitvā aññaṃ dhammakkhānaṃ gaṇhanti;
mnd4:33.3: gaṇaṃ gaṇhanti, taṃ muñcitvā aññaṃ gaṇaṃ gaṇhanti;
mnd4:33.4: diṭṭhiṃ gaṇhanti, taṃ muñcitvā aññaṃ diṭṭhiṃ gaṇhanti;
mnd4:33.5: paṭipadaṃ gaṇhanti, taṃ muñcitvā aññaṃ paṭipadaṃ gaṇhanti;
mnd4:33.6: maggaṃ gaṇhanti, taṃ muñcitvā aññaṃ maggaṃ gaṇhanti;
mnd4:33.7: gaṇhanti ca muñcanti ca ādiyanti ca nirassajanti cāti—
mnd4:34.2: Yathā makkaṭo araññe pavane caramāno sākhaṃ gaṇhāti, taṃ muñcitvā aññaṃ sākhaṃ gaṇhāti.
mnd4:34.3: Evamevaṃ puthusamaṇabrāhmaṇā puthudiṭṭhigatāni gaṇhanti ca muñcanti ca ādiyanti ca nirassajanti cāti—
mnd4:38.3: **Vatānī**ti hatthivataṃ vā assavataṃ vā govataṃ vā kukkūravataṃ vā kākavataṃ vā vāsudevavataṃ vā baladevavataṃ vā puṇṇabhaddavataṃ vā maṇibhaddavataṃ vā aggivataṃ vā nāgavataṃ vā supaṇṇavataṃ vā yakkhavataṃ vā asuravataṃ vā …pe…
mnd4:38.4: disāvataṃ vā ādāya samādāya ādiyitvā samādiyitvā gaṇhitvā parāmasitvā abhinivisitvā.
mnd4:39.7: **Saññasatto**ti kāmasaññāya byāpādasaññāya vihiṃsāsaññāya diṭṭhisaññāya satto visatto āsatto laggo laggito palibuddho.
mnd4:39.8: Yathā bhittikhile vā nāgadante vā bhaṇḍaṃ sattaṃ visattaṃ āsattaṃ laggaṃ laggitaṃ palibuddhaṃ, evamevaṃ kāmasaññāya byāpādasaññāya vihiṃsāsaññāya diṭṭhisaññāya satto visatto āsatto laggo laggito palibuddhoti—
mnd4:40.3: **Vedehī**ti **vedā** vuccanti catūsu maggesu ñāṇaṃ paññā paññindriyaṃ paññābalaṃ dhammavicayasambojjhaṅgo vīmaṃsā vipassanā sammādiṭṭhi.
mnd4:40.4: Tehi vedehi jātijarāmaraṇassa antagato antappatto, koṭigato koṭippatto, pariyantagato pariyantappatto, vosānagato vosānappatto, tāṇagato tāṇappatto, leṇagato leṇappatto, saraṇagato saraṇappatto, abhayagato abhayappatto, accutagato accutappatto, amatagato amatappatto, nibbānagato nibbānappatto.
mnd4:40.5: Vedānaṃ vā antagatoti **vedagū**, vedehi vā antagatoti vedagū, sattannaṃ vā dhammānaṃ viditattā vedagū.
mnd4:40.6: Sakkāyadiṭṭhi viditā hoti, vicikicchā viditā hoti, sīlabbataparāmāso vidito hoti, rāgo vidito hoti, doso vidito hoti, moho vidito hoti, māno vidito hoti, viditāssa honti pāpakā akusalā dhammā saṃkilesikā ponobhavikā sadarā dukkhavipākā āyatiṃ jātijarāmaraṇiyā.
mnd4:42.3: Sabbe saṅkhārā aniccāti samecca abhisamecca dhammaṃ;
mnd4:42.4: sabbe saṅkhārā dukkhāti samecca abhisamecca dhammaṃ;
mnd4:42.5: sabbe dhammā anattāti samecca abhisamecca dhammaṃ;
mnd4:42.31: ayaṃ dukkhanirodhagāminī paṭipadāti samecca abhisamecca dhammaṃ;
mnd4:42.35: ayaṃ āsavanirodhagāminī paṭipadāti samecca abhisamecca dhammaṃ;
mnd4:42.36: ime dhammā abhiññeyyāti samecca abhisamecca dhammaṃ;
mnd4:42.40: ime dhammā sacchikātabbāti samecca abhisamecca dhammaṃ.
mnd4:42.41: Channaṃ phassāyatanānaṃ samudayañca atthaṅgamañca assādañca ādīnavañca nissaraṇañca samecca abhisamecca dhammaṃ.
mnd4:42.42: Pañcannaṃ upādānakkhandhānaṃ samudayañca atthaṅgamañca assādañca ādīnavañca nissaraṇañca samecca abhisamecca dhammaṃ.
mnd4:42.43: Catunnaṃ mahābhūtānaṃ samudayañca atthaṅgamañca assādañca ādīnavañca nissaraṇañca samecca abhisamecca dhammaṃ.
mnd4:42.44: Yaṃ kiñci samudayadhammaṃ sabbaṃ taṃ nirodhadhammanti samecca abhisamecca dhammanti—
mnd4:43.1: **Na uccāvacaṃ gacchati bhūripañño**ti na satthārato satthāraṃ gacchati, na dhammakkhānato dhammakkhānaṃ gacchati, na gaṇato gaṇaṃ gacchati, na diṭṭhiyā diṭṭhiṃ gacchati, na paṭipadāya paṭipadaṃ gacchati, na maggato maggaṃ gacchati.
mnd4:43.2: **Bhūripañño**ti bhūripañño mahāpañño puthupañño hāsapañño javanapañño tikkhapañño nibbedhikapañño.
mnd4:43.4: Tāya pathavisamāya paññāya vipulāya vitthatāya samannāgatoti—
mnd4:46.2: **Yaṃ kiñci diṭṭhaṃ va sutaṃ mutaṃ vā;**
mnd4:47.1: **Sa sabbadhammesu visenibhūto yaṃ kiñci diṭṭhaṃ va sutaṃ mutaṃ vā**ti.
mnd4:47.3: Kāyaduccaritaṃ mārasenā, vacīduccaritaṃ mārasenā, manoduccaritaṃ mārasenā, rāgo mārasenā, doso mārasenā, moho mārasenā, kodho mārasenā, upanāho …pe… sabbākusalābhisaṅkhārā mārasenā.
mnd4:53.1: Yato catūhi ariyamaggehi sabbā ca mārasenā sabbe ca paṭisenikarā kilesā jitā ca parājitā ca bhaggā vippaluggā parammukhā, so vuccati visenibhūto.
mnd4:53.2: So diṭṭhe visenibhūto, sute visenibhūto, mute visenibhūto, viññāte visenibhūtoti—
mnd4:53.3: sa sabbadhammesu visenibhūto yaṃ kiñci diṭṭhaṃ va sutaṃ mutaṃ vā.
mnd4:54.2: Tameva suddhadassiṃ visuddhadassiṃ parisuddhadassiṃ vodātadassiṃ pariyodātadassiṃ.
mnd4:54.3: Atha vā, suddhadassanaṃ visuddhadassanaṃ parisuddhadassanaṃ vodātadassanaṃ pariyodātadassanaṃ.
mnd4:54.5: Tāni chadanāni vivaṭāni honti viddhaṃsitāni ugghāṭitāni samugghāṭitāni pahīnāni samucchinnāni vūpasantāni paṭipassaddhāni abhabbuppattikāni ñāṇagginā daḍḍhāni.
mnd4:54.6: **Carantan**ti carantaṃ vicarantaṃ viharantaṃ iriyantaṃ vattentaṃ pālentaṃ yapentaṃ yāpentanti—
mnd4:55.7: Taṇhākappassa pahīnattā diṭṭhikappassa paṭinissaṭṭhattā kena rāgena kappeyya, kena dosena kappeyya, kena mohena kappeyya, kena mānena kappeyya, kāya diṭṭhiyā kappeyya, kena uddhaccena kappeyya, kāya vicikicchāya kappeyya, kehi anusayehi kappeyya—
mnd4:55.8: rattoti vā duṭṭhoti vā mūḷhoti vā vinibaddhoti vā parāmaṭṭhoti vā vikkhepagatoti vā aniṭṭhaṅgatoti vā thāmagatoti vā.
mnd4:55.11: nerayikoti vā tiracchānayonikoti vā pettivisayikoti vā manussoti vā devoti vā rūpīti vā arūpīti vā saññīti vā asaññīti vā nevasaññīnāsaññīti vā.
mnd4:55.12: So hetu natthi, paccayo natthi, kāraṇaṃ natthi, yena kappeyya vikappeyya vikappaṃ āpajjeyya.
mnd4:55.13: **Lokasmin**ti apāyaloke manussaloke devaloke khandhaloke dhātuloke āyatanaloketi—
mnd4:57.2: Yaṃ kiñci diṭṭhaṃ va sutaṃ mutaṃ vā;
mnd4:59.7: Taṇhākappassa pahīnattā, diṭṭhikappassa paṭinissaṭṭhattā taṇhākappaṃ vā diṭṭhikappaṃ vā na kappenti na janenti na sañjanenti na nibbattenti nābhinibbattentīti—
mnd4:59.15: Taṇhāpurekkhārassa pahīnattā, diṭṭhipurekkhārassa paṭinissaṭṭhattā na taṇhaṃ vā na diṭṭhiṃ vā purato katvā caranti, na taṇhādhajā na taṇhāketū na taṇhādhipateyyā, na diṭṭhidhajā na diṭṭhiketū na diṭṭhādhipateyyā, na taṇhāya vā na diṭṭhiyā vā parivāritā carantīti—
mnd4:60.1: **Accantasuddhīti na te vadantī**ti accantasuddhiṃ saṃsārasuddhiṃ akiriyadiṭṭhiṃ sassatavādaṃ na vadanti na kathenti na bhaṇanti na dīpayanti na voharantīti—
mnd4:61.3: abhijjhākāyagantho, byāpādo kāyagantho, sīlabbataparāmāso kāyagantho, idaṃsaccābhiniveso kāyagantho.
mnd4:61.6: attano sīlaṃ vā vataṃ vā sīlavataṃ vā parāmasantīti sīlabbataparāmāso kāyagantho, attano diṭṭhi idaṃsaccābhiniveso kāyagantho.
mnd4:61.8: Tehi ganthehi rūpaṃ ādiyanti upādiyanti gaṇhanti parāmasanti abhinivisanti;
mnd4:61.17: saṃsāravaṭṭaṃ ādiyanti upādiyanti gaṇhanti parāmasanti abhinivisanti.
mnd4:61.21: Atha vā ganthe gadhite ganthite bandhe vibandhe ābandhe lagge laggite palibuddhe bandhane phoṭayitvā—
mnd4:61.23: Yathā vayhaṃ vā rathaṃ vā sakaṭaṃ vā sandamānikaṃ vā sajjaṃ visajjaṃ karonti vikopenti;
mnd4:61.26: Atha vā ganthe gathite ganthite bandhe vibandhe ābandhe lagge laggite palibuddhe bandhane phoṭayitvā visajjāti—
mnd4:62.2: **Āsā** vuccati taṇhā yo rāgo sārāgo …pe… abhijjhā lobho akusalamūlaṃ.
mnd4:62.3: **Āsaṃ na kubbantī**ti āsaṃ na kubbanti na janenti na sañjanenti na nibbattenti na abhinibbattenti.
mnd4:62.4: **Kuhiñcī**ti kuhiñci kimhici katthaci ajjhattaṃ vā bahiddhā vā ajjhattabahiddhā vā.
mnd4:66.1: **Sīmātigo brāhmaṇo tassa natthi, ñatvā va disvā va samuggahītan**ti.
mnd4:66.3: sakkāyadiṭṭhi, vicikicchā, sīlabbataparāmāso, diṭṭhānusayo, vicikicchānusayo, tadekaṭṭhā ca kilesā—
mnd4:66.5: Oḷārikaṃ kāmarāgasaṃyojanaṃ, paṭighasaṃyojanaṃ, oḷāriko kāmarāgānusayo, paṭighānusayo, tadekaṭṭhā ca kilesā—
mnd4:66.7: Anusahagataṃ kāmarāgasaṃyojanaṃ, paṭighasaṃyojanaṃ, anusahagato kāmarāgānusayo, paṭighānusayo, tadekaṭṭhā ca kilesā—
mnd4:66.9: Rūparāgo arūparāgo māno uddhaccaṃ avijjā, mānānusayo bhavarāgānusayo avijjānusayo, tadekaṭṭhā ca kilesā—
mnd4:66.11: Yato ca catūhi ariyamaggehi imā catasso sīmāyo atikkanto hoti samatikkanto vītivatto, so vuccati sīmātigo.
mnd4:66.13: sakkāyadiṭṭhi bāhitā hoti, vicikicchā bāhitā hoti, sīlabbataparāmāso bāhito hoti …pe…
mnd4:67.1: **Ñatvā**ti paracittañāṇena vā ñatvā pubbenivāsānussatiñāṇena vā ñatvā.
mnd4:67.2: **Disvā**ti maṃsacakkhunā vā disvā dibbacakkhunā vā disvā.
mnd4:67.3: **Sīmātigo brāhmaṇo tassa natthi, ñatvā va disvā va samuggahītan**ti.
mnd4:67.4: Tassa idaṃ paramaṃ aggaṃ seṭṭhaṃ visiṭṭhaṃ pāmokkhaṃ uttamaṃ pavaranti gahitaṃ parāmaṭṭhaṃ abhiniviṭṭhaṃ ajjhositaṃ adhimuttaṃ natthi na santi na saṃvijjati nupalabbhati, pahīnaṃ samucchinnaṃ vūpasantaṃ paṭipassaddhaṃ abhabbuppattikaṃ ñāṇagginā daḍḍhanti—
mnd4:67.5: sīmātigo brāhmaṇo tassa natthi ñatvā va disvā va samuggahītaṃ.
mnd4:68.2: **Rāgarattā** vuccanti ye pañcasu kāmaguṇesu rattā giddhā gadhitā mucchitā ajjhosannā laggā laggitā palibuddhā.
mnd4:68.3: Virāgarattā vuccanti ye rūpāvacaraarūpāvacarasamāpattīsu rattā giddhā gadhitā mucchitā ajjhosannā laggā laggitā palibuddhā.
mnd4:68.4: **Na rāgarāgī na virāgaratto**ti yato kāmarāgo ca rūparāgo ca arūparāgo ca pahīnā honti ucchinnamūlā tālāvatthukatā anabhāvaṃkatā āyatiṃ anuppādadhammā.
mnd4:69.3: Tassa idaṃ paramaṃ aggaṃ seṭṭhaṃ visiṭṭhaṃ pāmokkhaṃ uttamaṃ pavaranti gahitaṃ parāmaṭṭhaṃ abhiniviṭṭhaṃ ajjhositaṃ adhimuttaṃ natthi na santi na saṃvijjati nupalabbhati, pahīnaṃ samucchinnaṃ vūpasantaṃ paṭipassaddhaṃ abhabbuppattikaṃ ñāṇagginā daḍḍhanti—
